General.Name: Tibet Galaxy Science & Technology Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Tibet Development Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of beer under the Lhasa brand in China. The company was formerly known as Tibet Galaxy Science & Technology Development Co., Ltd. Tibet Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.
General.Address: Tianfu International Financial Center, Chengdu, China, 610000
